title: SpongeBob SquarePants
description: Join SpongeBob and his friends in their underwater adventures.

title: Adventure Time
description: Finn and Jake embark on surreal adventures in the Land of Ooo.

title: One Piece
description: An epic adventure on the high seas with Luffy and his crew.

title: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: Inception
description: A thief who steals corporate secrets of dream-sharing technology and is given the inverse task.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: One Punch Man
description: The story of Saitama, a hero that does it just for fun & can defeat his enemies with a single punch.

title: Rick and Morty
description: An animated series that follows the exploits of a super scientist and his not-so-bright grandson.

title: The Simpsons
description: The satiric adventures of a working-class family in the misfit city of Springfield.

title: Breaking Bad
description: A high school chemistry teacher turned meth maker partners with a former student to secure his family's future.

title: Game of Thrones
description: Nine noble families fight for control over the mythical lands of Westeros.

title: The Walking Dead
description: Sheriff Deputy Rick Grimes wakes up from a coma to learn the world is in ruins, and must lead a group of survivors to stay alive.

title: Attack on Titan
description: Humanity lives in cities surrounded by enormous walls due to the Titans, gigantic humanoid creatures.

title: My Hero Academia
description: In a world where people with superpowers are the norm, Izuku Midoriya dreams of becoming a Hero.

title: Naruto
description: Follows the journey of Naruto Uzumaki, a young ninja who seeks recognition from his peers.

title: Death Note
description: Light Yagami finds a mysterious notebook that allows him to kill anyone by writing their name while picturing their face.

title: Sword Art Online
description: Players trapped in a virtual reality MMORPG must beat the game to escape, facing dangers both in-game and in reality.

title: Fullmetal Alchemist Brotherhood
description: Two brothers seek the Philosopher's Stone to restore their bodies after a failed alchemy experiment.

title: Cowboy Bebop
description: A group of bounty hunters chase criminals across the galaxy aboard their spaceship, the Bebop.

title: Evangelion
description: A group of teenagers pilot giant robots to protect Earth from mysterious creatures known as Angels.
